Title: Web Service Studio Express
Description: Web Service Studio Express is a tool to help testing and debugging Web services. Using this program you can select a Web service on the net (e.g. Intranet or Internet), view a list of supported operations and dinamically invoke its methods, making easier the task of testing the correct behavior of the service.
HomeWiki:
Web Service Studio Express

Web Service Studio Express is a tool to help testing and debugging Web services. Using this program you can select a Web service on the net (e.g. Intranet or Internet), view a list of supported operations and dinamically invoke its methods, making easier the task of testing the correct behavior of the service.



System requirements:
  • Visual Studio 2005 (the project is written in C# and Visual Basic .NET)
  • Internet connection
